verses.verse: Now the Philistines <WH6430> gathered together <WH622> <WH8799> their armies <WH4264> to battle <WH4421>, and were gathered together <WH622> <WH8735> at Shochoh <WH7755>, which belongeth to Y'hudah <WH3063>, and pitched <WH2583> <WH8799> between Shochoh <WH7755> and Azekah <WH5825>, in Ephesdammim <WH658>.

And Saul <WH7586> and the men <WH376> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> were gathered together <WH622> <WH8738>, and pitched <WH2583> <WH8799> by the valley <WH6010> of Elah <WH425>, and set the battle <WH4421> in array <WH6186> <WH8799> against <WH7125> <WH8800> the Philistines <WH6430>.

And the Philistines <WH6430> stood <WH5975> <WH8802> on a mountain <WH2022> on the one side, and Yisra'EL <WH3478> stood <WH5975> <WH8802> on a mountain <WH2022> on the other side: and there was a valley <WH1516> between them.

And there went out <WH3318> <WH8799> a champion <WH376> <WH1143> out of the camp <WH4264> of the Philistines <WH6430>, named <WH8034> Goliath <WH1555>, of Gat <WH1661>, whose height <WH1363> was six <WH8337> cubits <WH520> and a span <WH2239>.

And he had an helmet <WH3553> of brass <WH5178> upon his head <WH7218>, and he was armed <WH3847> <WH8803> with a coat <WH8302> of mail <WH7193>; and the weight <WH4948> of the coat <WH8302> was five <WH2568> thousand <WH505> shekels <WH8255> of brass <WH5178>.
And he had greaves <WH4697> of brass <WH5178> upon his legs <WH7272>, and a target <WH3591> of brass <WH5178> between his shoulders <WH3802>.

And the staff <WH6086> <WH8675> <WH2671> of his spear <WH2595> was like a weaver's <WH707> <WH8802> beam <WH4500>; and his spear's <WH2595> head <WH3852> weighed six <WH8337> hundred <WH3967> shekels <WH8255> of iron <WH1270>: and one bearing <WH5375> <WH8802> a shield <WH6793> went <WH1980> <WH8802> before <WH6440> him.

And he stood <WH5975> <WH8799> and cried <WH7121> <WH8799> unto the armies <WH4634> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, Why are ye come out <WH3318> <WH8799> to set your battle <WH4421> in array <WH6186> <WH8800>? am not I a Philistine <WH6430>, and ye servants <WH5650> to Saul <WH7586>? choose <WH1262> <WH8798> you a man <WH376> for you, and let him come down <WH3381> <WH8799> to me.

If he be able <WH3201> <WH8799> to fight <WH3898> <WH8736> with me, and to kill <WH5221> <WH8689> me, then will we be your servants <WH5650>: but if I prevail <WH3201> <WH8799> against him, and kill <WH5221> <WH8689> him, then shall ye be our servants <WH5650>, and serve <WH5647> <WH8804> us.

And the Philistine <WH6430> said <WH559> <WH8799>, I defy <WH2778> <WH8765> the armies <WH4634> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> this day <WH3117>; give <WH5414> <WH8798> me a man <WH376>, that we may fight <WH3898> <WH8735> together <WH3162>.

When Saul <WH7586> and all Yisra'EL <WH3478> heard <WH8085> <WH8799> those words <WH1697> of the Philistine <WH6430>, they were dismayed <WH2865> <WH8735>, and greatly <WH3966> afraid <WH3372> <WH8799>.

Now David <WH1732> was the son <WH1121> of that Ephrathite <WH376> <WH673> of Beit-Lechemjudah <WH1035> <WH3063>, whose name <WH8034> was Yishai <WH3448>; and he had eight <WH8083> sons <WH1121>: and the man <WH376> went <WH935> <WH8804> among men <WH582> for an old man <WH2204> <WH8804> in the days <WH3117> of Saul <WH7586>.

And the three <WH7969> eldest <WH1419> sons <WH1121> of Yishai <WH3448> went <WH3212> <WH8799> and followed <WH310> Saul <WH7586> to the battle <WH4421>: and the names <WH8034> of his three <WH7969> sons <WH1121> that went <WH1980> <WH8804> to the battle <WH4421> were Eliab <WH446> the firstborn <WH1060>, and next <WH4932> unto him Abinadab <WH41>, and the third <WH7992> Shammah <WH8048>.
And David <WH1732> was the youngest <WH6996>: and the three <WH7969> eldest <WH1419> followed <WH1980> <WH8804> <WH310> Saul <WH7586>.
But David <WH1732> went <WH1980> <WH8802> and returned <WH7725> <WH8802> from Saul <WH7586> to feed <WH7462> <WH8800> his father's <WH1> sheep <WH6629> at Beit-Lechem <WH1035>.
And the Philistine <WH6430> drew near <WH5066> <WH8799> morning <WH7925> <WH8687> and evening <WH6150> <WH8687>, and presented <WH3320> <WH8691> himself forty <WH705> days <WH3117>.

And Yishai <WH3448> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto David <WH1732> his son <WH1121>, Take <WH3947> <WH8798> now for thy brethren <WH251> an ephah <WH374> of this <WH2088> parched <WH7039> corn, and these ten <WH6235> loaves <WH3899>, and run <WH7323> <WH8685> to the camp <WH4264> to thy brethren <WH251>;

And carry <WH935> <WH8686> these ten <WH6235> cheeses <WH2461> <WH2757> unto the captain <WH8269> of their thousand <WH505>, and look <WH6485> <WH8799> how thy brethren <WH251> fare <WH7965>, and take <WH3947> <WH8799> their pledge <WH6161>.
Now Saul <WH7586>, and they, and all the men <WH376> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, were in the valley <WH6010> of Elah <WH425>, fighting <WH3898> <WH8737> with the Philistines <WH6430>.

And David <WH1732> rose up early <WH7925> <WH8686> in the morning <WH1242>, and left <WH5203> <WH8799> the sheep <WH6629> with a keeper <WH8104> <WH8802>, and took <WH5375> <WH8799>, and went <WH3212> <WH8799>, as Yishai <WH3448> had commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> him; and he came <WH935> <WH8799> to the trench <WH4570>, as the host <WH2428> was going forth <WH3318> <WH8802> to the fight <WH4634>, and shouted <WH7321> <WH8689> for the battle <WH4421>.
For Yisra'EL <WH3478> and the Philistines <WH6430> had put the battle in array <WH6186> <WH8799>, army <WH4634> against <WH7125> <WH8800> army <WH4634>.

And David <WH1732> left <WH5203> <WH8799> his carriage <WH3627> in the hand <WH3027> of the keeper <WH8104> <WH8802> of the carriage <WH3627>, and ran <WH7323> <WH8799> into the army <WH4634>, and came <WH935> <WH8799> and saluted <WH7592> <WH8799> <WH7965> his brethren <WH251>.

And as he talked <WH1696> <WH8764> with them, behold, there came up <WH5927> <WH8802> the champion <WH376> <WH1143>, the Philistine <WH6430> of Gat <WH1661>, Goliath <WH1555> by name <WH8034>, out of the armies <WH4634> <WH8675> <WH4630> of the Philistines <WH6430>, and spake <WH1696> <WH8762> according to the same <WH428> words <WH1697>: and David <WH1732> heard <WH8085> <WH8799> them.
And all the men <WH376> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, when they saw <WH7200> <WH8800> the man <WH376>, fled <WH5127> <WH8799> from him <WH6440>, and were sore <WH3966> afraid <WH3372> <WH8799>.

And the men <WH376> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Have ye seen <WH7200> <WH8804> this man <WH376> that is come up <WH5927> <WH8802>? surely to defy <WH2778> <WH8763> Yisra'EL <WH3478> is he come up <WH5927> <WH8802>: and it shall be, that the man <WH376> who killeth <WH5221> <WH8686> him, the king <WH4428> will enrich <WH6238> <WH8686> him with great <WH1419> riches <WH6239>, and will give <WH5414> <WH8799> him his daughter <WH1323>, and make <WH6213> <WH8799> his father's <WH1> house <WH1004> free <WH2670> in Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

And David <WH1732> spake <WH559> <WH8799> to the men <WH582> that stood <WH5975> <WH8802> by him, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, What shall be done <WH6213> <WH8735> to the man <WH376> that killeth <WH5221> <WH8686> this <WH1975> Philistine <WH6430>, and taketh away <WH5493> <WH8689> the reproach <WH2781> from Yisra'EL <WH3478>? for who is this uncircumcised <WH6189> Philistine <WH6430>, that he should defy <WH2778> <WH8765> the armies <WH4634> of the living <WH2416> 'Elohim <WH430> ?
And the people <WH5971> answered <WH559> <WH8799> him after this manner <WH1697>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, So shall it be done <WH6213> <WH8735> to the man <WH376> that killeth <WH5221> <WH8686> him.

And Eliab <WH446> his eldest <WH1419> brother <WH251> heard <WH8085> <WH8799> when he spake <WH1696> <WH8763> unto the men <WH582>; and Eliab's <WH446> anger <WH639> was kindled <WH2734> <WH8799> against David <WH1732>, and he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Why camest thou down <WH3381> <WH8804> hither? and with whom hast thou left <WH5203> <WH8804> those <WH2007> few <WH4592> sheep <WH6629> in the wilderness <WH4057>? I know <WH3045> <WH8804> thy pride <WH2087>, and the naughtiness <WH7455> of thine heart <WH3824>; for thou art come down <WH3381> <WH8804> that thou mightest see <WH7200> <WH8800> the battle <WH4421>.
And David <WH1732> said <WH559> <WH8799>, What have I now done <WH6213> <WH8804>? Is there not a cause <WH1697> ?

And he turned <WH5437> <WH8735> from him <WH681> toward <WH4136> another <WH312>, and spake <WH559> <WH8799> after the same manner <WH1697>: and the people <WH5971> answered <WH1697> him again <WH7725> <WH8686> after the former <WH7223> manner <WH1697>.

And when the words <WH1697> were heard <WH8085> <WH8735> which David <WH1732> spake <WH1696> <WH8765>, they rehearsed <WH5046> <WH8686> them before <WH6440> Saul <WH7586>: and he sent <WH3947> <WH8799> for him.

And David <WH1732> said <WH559> <WH8799> to Saul <WH7586>, Let no man's <WH120> heart <WH3820> fail <WH5307> <WH8799> because of him; thy servant <WH5650> will go <WH3212> <WH8799> and fight <WH3898> <WH8738> with this Philistine <WH6430>.

And Saul <WH7586> said <WH559> <WH8799> to David <WH1732>, Thou art not able <WH3201> <WH8799> to go <WH3212> <WH8800> against this Philistine <WH6430> to fight <WH3898> <WH8736> with him: for thou art but a youth <WH5288>, and he a man <WH376> of war <WH4421> from his youth <WH5271>.

And David <WH1732> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Saul <WH7586>, Thy servant <WH5650> kept <WH7462> <WH8802> his father's <WH1> sheep <WH6629>, and there came <WH935> <WH8804> a lion <WH738>, and a bear <WH1677>, and took <WH5375> <WH8804> a lamb <WH7716> <WH8675> <WH2089> out of the flock <WH5739>:

And I went out <WH3318> <WH8804> after <WH310> him, and smote <WH5221> <WH8689> him, and delivered <WH5337> <WH8689> it out of his mouth <WH6310>: and when he arose <WH6965> <WH8799> against me, I caught <WH2388> <WH8689> him by his beard <WH2206>, and smote <WH5221> <WH8689> him, and slew <WH4191> <WH8689> him.

Thy servant <WH5650> slew <WH5221> <WH8689> both the lion <WH738> and the bear <WH1677>: and this uncircumcised <WH6189> Philistine <WH6430> shall be as one <WH259> of them, seeing he hath defied <WH2778> <WH8765> the armies <WH4634> of the living <WH2416> 'Elohim <WH430>.

David <WH1732> said <WH559> <WH8799> moreover, The YY <WH3068> that delivered <WH5337> <WH8689> me out of the paw <WH3027> of the lion <WH738>, and out of the paw <WH3027> of the bear <WH1677>, he will deliver <WH5337> <WH8686> me out of the hand <WH3027> of this Philistine <WH6430>. And Saul <WH7586> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto David <WH1732>, Go <WH3212> <WH8798>, and the YY <WH3068> be with thee.

And Saul <WH7586> armed <WH3847> <WH8686> David <WH1732> with his armour <WH4055>, and he put <WH5414> <WH8804> an helmet <WH6959> of brass <WH5178> upon his head <WH7218>; also he armed <WH3847> <WH8686> him with a coat of mail <WH8302>.

And David <WH1732> girded <WH2296> <WH8799> his sword <WH2719> upon his armour <WH4055>, and he assayed <WH2974> <WH8686> to go <WH3212> <WH8800>; for he had not proved <WH5254> <WH8765> it. And David <WH1732> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Saul <WH7586>, I cannot <WH3201> <WH8799> go <WH3212> <WH8800> with these; for I have not proved <WH5254> <WH8765> them. And David <WH1732> put <WH5493> <WH8686> them off him.

And he took <WH3947> <WH8799> his staff <WH4731> in his hand <WH3027>, and chose <WH977> <WH8799> him five <WH2568> smooth <WH2512> stones <WH68> out of the brook <WH5158>, and put <WH7760> <WH8799> them in a shepherd's <WH7462> <WH8802> bag <WH3627> which he had, even in a scrip <WH3219>; and his sling <WH7050> was in his hand <WH3027>: and he drew near <WH5066> <WH8799> to the Philistine <WH6430>.

And the Philistine <WH6430> came <WH3212> <WH8799> on <WH1980> <WH8802> and drew near <WH7131> unto David <WH1732>; and the man <WH376> that bare <WH5375> <WH8802> the shield <WH6793> went before <WH6440> him.

And when the Philistine <WH6430> looked about <WH5027> <WH8686>, and saw <WH7200> <WH8799> David <WH1732>, he disdained <WH959> <WH8799> him: for he was but a youth <WH5288>, and ruddy <WH132>, and of a fair <WH3303> countenance <WH4758>.

And the Philistine <WH6430> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto David <WH1732>, Am I a dog <WH3611>, that thou comest <WH935> <WH8802> to me with staves <WH4731>? And the Philistine <WH6430> cursed <WH7043> <WH8762> David <WH1732> by his 'elohim <WH430>.

And the Philistine <WH6430> said <WH559> <WH8799> to David <WH1732>, Come <WH3212> <WH8798> to me, and I will give <WH5414> <WH8799> thy flesh <WH1320> unto the fowls <WH5775> of the air <WH8064>, and to the beasts <WH929> of the field <WH7704>.

Then said <WH559> <WH8799> David <WH1732> to the Philistine <WH6430>, Thou comest <WH935> <WH8802> to me with a sword <WH2719>, and with a spear <WH2595>, and with a shield <WH3591>: but I come <WH935> <WH8802> to thee in the name <WH8034> of the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>, the 'Elohim <WH430> of the armies <WH4634> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, whom thou hast defied <WH2778> <WH8765>.

This day <WH3117> will the YY <WH3068> deliver <WH5462> <WH8762> thee into mine hand <WH3027>; and I will smite <WH5221> <WH8689> thee, and take <WH5493> <WH8689> thine head <WH7218> from thee; and I will give <WH5414> <WH8804> the carcases <WH6297> of the host <WH4264> of the Philistines <WH6430> this day <WH3117> unto the fowls <WH5775> of the air <WH8064>, and to the wild beasts <WH2416> of the earth <WH776>; that all the earth <WH776> may know <WH3045> <WH8799> that there is <WH3426> a 'Elohim <WH430> in Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

And all this assembly <WH6951> shall know <WH3045> <WH8799> that the YY <WH3068> saveth <WH3467> <WH8686> not with sword <WH2719> and spear <WH2595>: for the battle <WH4421> is the YY'S <WH3068>, and he will give <WH5414> <WH8804> you into our hands <WH3027>.

And it came to pass, when the Philistine <WH6430> arose <WH6965> <WH8804>, and came <WH3212> <WH8799> and drew nigh <WH7126> <WH8799> to meet <WH7125> <WH8800> David <WH1732>, that David <WH1732> hasted <WH4116> <WH8762>, and ran <WH7323> <WH8799> toward the army <WH4634> to meet <WH7125> <WH8800> the Philistine <WH6430>.

And David <WH1732> put <WH7971> <WH8799> his hand <WH3027> in his bag <WH3627>, and took <WH3947> <WH8799> thence a stone <WH68>, and slang <WH7049> <WH8762> it, and smote <WH5221> <WH8686> the Philistine <WH6430> in his forehead <WH4696>, that the stone <WH68> sunk <WH2883> <WH8799> into his forehead <WH4696>; and he fell <WH5307> <WH8799> upon his face <WH6440> to the earth <WH776>.

So David <WH1732> prevailed <WH2388> <WH8799> over <WH4480> the Philistine <WH6430> with a sling <WH7050> and with a stone <WH68>, and smote <WH5221> <WH8686> the Philistine <WH6430>, and slew <WH4191> <WH8686> him; but there was no sword <WH2719> in the hand <WH3027> of David <WH1732>.

Therefore David <WH1732> ran <WH7323> <WH8799>, and stood <WH5975> <WH8799> upon the Philistine <WH6430>, and took <WH3947> <WH8799> his sword <WH2719>, and drew <WH8025> <WH8799> it out of the sheath <WH8593> thereof, and slew <WH4191> <WH8787> him, and cut off <WH3772> <WH8799> his head <WH7218> therewith. And when the Philistines <WH6430> saw <WH7200> <WH8799> their champion <WH1368> was dead <WH4191> <WH8804>, they fled <WH5127> <WH8799>.

And the men <WH582> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> and of Y'hudah <WH3063> arose <WH6965> <WH8799>, and shouted <WH7321> <WH8686>, and pursued <WH7291> <WH8799> the Philistines <WH6430>, until thou come <WH935> <WH8800> to the valley <WH1516>, and to the gates <WH8179> of Ekron <WH6138>. And the wounded <WH2491> of the Philistines <WH6430> fell down <WH5307> <WH8799> by the way <WH1870> to Shaaraim <WH8189>, even unto Gat <WH1661>, and unto Ekron <WH6138>.

And the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> returned <WH7725> <WH8799> from chasing <WH1814> <WH8800> after <WH310> the Philistines <WH6430>, and they spoiled <WH8155> <WH8799> their tents <WH4264>.

And David <WH1732> took <WH3947> <WH8799> the head <WH7218> of the Philistine <WH6430>, and brought <WH935> <WH8686> it to Yerushalayim <WH3389>; but he put <WH7760> <WH8804> his armour <WH3627> in his tent <WH168>.

And when Saul <WH7586> saw <WH7200> <WH8800> David <WH1732> go forth <WH3318> <WH8802> against <WH7125> <WH8800> the Philistine <WH6430>, he said <WH559> <WH8804> unto Abner <WH74>, the captain <WH8269> of the host <WH6635>, Abner <WH74>, whose son <WH1121> is this youth <WH5288>? And Abner <WH74> said <WH559> <WH8799>, As thy soul <WH5315> liveth <WH2416>, O king <WH4428>, I cannot <WH518> tell <WH3045> <WH8804>.
And the king <WH4428> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Enquire <WH7592> <WH8798> thou whose son <WH1121> the stripling <WH5958> is.

And as David <WH1732> returned <WH7725> <WH8800> from the slaughter <WH5221> <WH8687> of the Philistine <WH6430>, Abner <WH74> took <WH3947> <WH8799> him, and brought <WH935> <WH8686> him before <WH6440> Saul <WH7586> with the head <WH7218> of the Philistine <WH6430> in his hand <WH3027>.

And Saul <WH7586> said <WH559> <WH8799> to him, Whose son <WH1121> art thou, thou young man <WH5288>? And David <WH1732> answered <WH559> <WH8799>, I am the son <WH1121> of thy servant <WH5650> Yishai <WH3448> the Beit-Lechemite <WH1022>.
